00074 SMDQMClientExample::SMDQMClientExample( const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig )
00075   : counter(0)
00076 {
00077   // get hold of back-end interface
00078   dbe = edm::Service<DQMStore>().operator->();
00079 
00080   dbe->showDirStructure();

00098 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00099 void SMDQMClientExample::analyze(const edm::Event& iEvent, 
00100              const edm::EventSetup& iSetup )
00101 {   
00102   std::vector<std::string> topLevelFolderList;
00103   dbe->cd();
00104   topLevelFolderList = dbe->getSubdirs();
00105 
00106   std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator dirIter;
00107   for (dirIter = topLevelFolderList.begin();
00108        dirIter != topLevelFolderList.end();
00109        dirIter++) {
00110     std::string dirName = *dirIter;
00111     std::cout << "### directory = " << dirName << std::endl;
00112   }
00113   dbe->showDirStructure();
00114 
00115   // determine the "global" status of the system
00116   int status = dbe->getStatus();
00117   switch(status)
00118   {
00119     case dqm::qstatus::ERROR:
00120       cout << " Error(s)";
00121       break;
00122     case dqm::qstatus::WARNING:
00123       cout << " Warning(s)";
00124       break;
00125     case dqm::qstatus::OTHER:
00126       cout << " Some tests did not run;";
00127       break; 
00128     default:
00129       cout << " No problems";
00130   }
00131   cout << " after getSystemStatus" << endl;
00132 
00133   h7 = dbe->get("C1/C3/histo7");
00134   if(h7) {
00135     // fit h7 to gaussian
00136     TH1F * root_ob = h7->getTH1F();
00137      double int_ent = root_ob->Integral();
00138      double num_ent = root_ob->GetEntries();
00139      std::cout << "num entries in h7 = " << num_ent
00140                << " integral of bin contents = " << int_ent << std::endl;
00141     root_ob->Fit("gaus");
00142      root_ob->Reset();
00143   } else {
00144     std::cout << "did not find histo7" << std::endl;
00145   }
00146 
00147   h8 = dbe->get("D1/histo8");
00148   if(h8) {
00149     // fit h7 to gaussian
00150     TH1F * root_ob = h8->getTH1F();
00151      double int_ent = root_ob->Integral();
00152      double num_ent = root_ob->GetEntries();
00153      std::cout << "num entries in h8 = " << num_ent
00154                << " integral of bin contents = " << int_ent << std::endl;
00155     root_ob->Fit("gaus");
00156     //root_ob->Fit("gaus","Q");
00157      //root_ob->Reset();
00158   } else {
00159     std::cout << "did not find histo8" << std::endl;
00160   }
00161 
00162   i1 = dbe->get("C1/C3/int1");
00163   if(i1) {
00164     std::cout << "int1 value string: \"" << i1->valueString() << "\"" << std::endl;
00165   } else {
00166     std::cout << "did not find int1" << std::endl;
00167   }
00168 
00169   ++counter;
00170 }

00172 void SMDQMClientExample::endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock const& lumiSeg, 
00173                                             edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00174 {
00175   std::cout << "Doing end of lumi processing for lumi number "
00176             << lumiSeg.luminosityBlock() << " of run " 
00177             << lumiSeg.run() << std::endl;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void SMDQMClientExample::endRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00181 {
00182   std::cout << "Doing end of run processing for run number "
00183             <<  run.run() << std::endl;
00184 }
